meanings: [동사] lie in ambush (for), wait in ambush (for)

vlive.korean: 왜 자꾸 무섭게 그런 얘기 해~ - 하나 매복이어서 지금 - 사탕 어디 있어요? Why are you keep on saying scary things? - One of them is impacted. - Where is the candy? 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX 화이트데이
vlive.english: Why are you keep on saying scary things? - One of them is impacted. - Where is the candy?

examples.korean: Two soldiers were killed in a terrorist ambush. 발음듣기 테러범들의 매복 공격으로 군인 두 명이 사망했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Two soldiers were killed in a terrorist ambush. 발음

examples.korean: They were lying in ambush, waiting for the aid convoy. 발음듣기 그들은 매복을 하여 구호물자 호송 차량을 기다렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were lying in ambush, waiting for the aid convoy. 발음

examples.korean: The guerrillas ambushed them near the bridge. 발음듣기 게릴라들이 다리 근방에 매복해 있다가 그들을 공격했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The guerrillas ambushed them near the bridge. 발음

examples.korean: They lay in ambush[wait] for us. 발음듣기 그들은 매복하여 우리를 기다리고 있었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They lay in ambush[wait] for us. 발음

examples.korean: A sniper was waiting in ambush behind a tree. 발음듣기 저격수가 나무 뒤에 매복하고 있었다 Neungyule
examples.english: A sniper was waiting in ambush behind a tree. 발음
